sentence.Network_en: I've known him since he was knee - high to a grasshopper.
sentence.Network_cn: 他很小的时候我就认识他了.

sentence.Network_en: Charles started reading when he was knee - high to a grasshopper.
sentence.Network_cn: 查尔斯在很小的时候就开始读书了.

sentence.Network_en: He thought he had made an end of the little grasshopper.
sentence.Network_cn: 他以为把那个小蚱蜢干掉了.

昆虫名称汉英对照大全。节肢动物不算_百度知道 ... grasshopper 蚱蜢 grasshopper 蝗虫 gypsy moth 舞毒蛾.

list.abs: ...蚱蜢效应（grasshopper effect）是指污染物透过挥发或是风力的影响，不断的释放至大气中，然后再藉由沉降作用（例如降雨（回到陆地上，并随季节变化一直在反覆进行著。==介绍==持久性有机污染物（persistent organic pollutants ，POPs）能经由大气传输到.

grassed earthen embankment 植草土堤grasshopper rig 轻型钻机grasshopper 液面控制装置
grasshopper 蝗虫grasshopper control 蝗虫防治grassland 草地

entry.def: A grasshopper is an insect with long back legs that jumps high into the air and makes a high, vibrating sound.

means.word_mean: 1. terrestrial plant-eating insect with hind legs adapted for leaping
2. a cocktail made of creme de menthe and cream (sometimes with creme de cacao)
